CustomField.formula: if( NOT(ISNULL(Account_Name2__c)|| ISBLANK(Account_Name2__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Account_Name3__c) || ISBLANK(Account_Name3__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(Account_Name4__c) || ISBLANK(Account_Name4__c) ), Account_Name2__c+', '+Account_Name3__c+', '+Account_Name4__c, IF( (ISNULL(Account_Name2__c)|| ISBLANK(Account_Name2__c)) && (ISNULL(Account_Name3__c) || ISBLANK(Account_Name3__c)), Account_Name4__c, IF(( ISNULL(Account_Name3__c)|| ISBLANK(Account_Name3__c)) && (ISNULL(Account_Name4__c) || ISBLANK(Account_Name4__c)), Account_Name2__c, IF((ISNULL(Account_Name4__c)|| ISBLANK(Account_Name4__c)) && (ISNULL(Account_Name2__c) || ISBLANK(Account_Name2__c)), Account_Name3__c, IF(ISNULL(Account_Name2__c)||ISBLANK(Account_Name2__c), Account_Name3__c+', '+Account_Name4__c, IF(ISNULL(Account_Name3__c) || ISBLANK(Account_Name3__c), Account_Name2__c+', '+Account_Name4__c, IF(ISNULL(Account_Name4__c) || ISBLANK(Account_Name4__c), Account_Name2__c+', '+Account_Name3__c,'' ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Ship To Name
